name: Ultimate Dorm Package
description:
The Ultimate Dorm Package is the worry-free essential bundle of "things-you-need" in a dorm room setting.  Using the College Board's Dorm Room Checklist we've created the ultimate starter kit for your grad. Why shop around for the check-list items and spend countless dollars when we've bundled it all for you! Save Hundreds of dollars if each item were bought separately. Save money for those textbooks!

The Ultimate Dorm Package Includes:
<font></bold>1 Frying Pan
1 Sauce Pan
1 Pocket Umbrella
6 Dinner Plates (Melamine)- In White
1- Mattress Cover
1 Medium Underbed STORAGE BAG 
1 Large size STORAGE BAG 
2 Pillow Covers
32 Closet Hangers
2 Large Plush Body Towels- White
2 Plush Face Towels- White
2 Plush Wash Towels- White
2 Stainless Steel Cereal/Soup Spoons
2 Stainless Steel Dinner Forks
2 Stainless Steel Dinner Knives
1 Set- Stainless Steel Steak Knife & Fork 
2 Chip Clips
1 Can Opener/Bottle Opener 
1 Deluxe Nylon Slotted Spatula
1 Deluxe Nylon Slotted Spoon
1 Deluxe Nylon Pasta Server Utensil
1 Deluxe Nylon Cooking Spoon
2 20OZ Portable/Reusable Beverage Bottles
2 Large Coffee Mugs
3 RUBBERMAID Brand Takealongs Rectangle Food Storage Containers
3 RUBBERMAID Brand  Twist & Seal Food Storage Containers
4 STERILITE Brand Cereal/Soup Bowls
1 STERILITE Brand 8QT Bedside/Deskside Trash Bin

Plastic Storage:
1  STERILITE Brand 35 Qt Underbed Latch Box
1 STERILITE Brand 3 Chester Drawer Storage Cart (On Wheels)</bold><font>

BEST VALUE! Over 80+ Items

PLUS:

name: Basic Iron
description:
Sometimes you've gotta make sure everything is pressed! Black & Decker Iron compact in size and easy to use. Gets the job done!


Steam out wrinkles in an instant Our SmartSteam technology automatically generates the right amount of steam for the fabric type selected. This iron delivers the speed and performance you need for quick and easy ironing.

Features:

– Non stick soleplate smart steam
– Vertical and horizontal steam
– 3 Way auto shut off and anti drip
– Spray mist and surge of steam
– 360° Swivel cord and 1200 wattage

name: George Foreman Grill
description:
With the George Foreman Lean Mean Fat Reducing Grilling Machine Champ Grill you can enjoy great-tasting, healthier meals in minutes. Its nonstick grill plates allow you to quickly and easily cook your favorite foods without oil or butter, while its innovative design helps knock out the unhealthy fat. With millions of grills sold worldwide, there's never been a better time to discover your passion for flavorful, healthy food by cooking with George.

Eat real in your dorm room! Change it up with a George Foreman!
